scripts.build-canary: CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_LTO=true cargo build -p atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-opt --strip-debug -O ../../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/canary/atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin.wasm -o atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin.wasm
scripts.build-release: CARGO_PROFILE_RELEASE_LTO=true cargo build -p atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-opt --strip-debug -O ../../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin.wasm -o atlaspack_contextual_imports_swc_plugin.wasm
